item.title: 01 Overview and Getting Started
item.description: why rust You might be asking yourself , why should i learn rust ? Now lets take two approaches on this question , if you are new to programming or someone who is eager to learn something new and exicting. Learning anything is only going to benefit you, whether is javascript,python, c or Rust .Lets focus on How more than Why because if you are stuck on why should i , you are never going to go forward .
